queries.query:
from(bucket: "Stromzähler")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Stromzähler")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Momentanleistung_P+" or r["_field"] == "Momentanleistung_P-")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Stromzähler")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Stromzähler")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Strom_L1" or r["_field"] == "Strom_L2" or r["_field"] == "Strom_L3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Stromzähler")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Stromzähler")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Momentanleistung_P+")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Stromzähler")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Stromzähler")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Wirkenergie_A+" or r["_field"] == "Wirkenergie_A-")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Stromzähler")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Stromzähler")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Spannung_L1" or r["_field"] == "Spannung_L2" or r["_field"] == "Spannung_L3")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "Stromzähler")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Stromzähler")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Leistungsfaktor")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
